title: aLLudE manamidai aDiyuDan kollai
sahitya:
aLLudE manamidai aDiyuDan kollai koLLudE kaNNA un vaDivazhaginilE


anupallavi

  teLLat-teLinda nilavoLi tanilE oLi viDum dEvadEva mAdhava giridhara gOpAla un tInkuzhalishaiyinil


caraNam    vanamAlai malarmAlai ashaindADudE kUDa maNamAnadadanODu ishaindADudE gOvardhana mAlai shumanda karam AdudE ubhaya caraNangaL sariyAna layam pODudE oru matam koNDa kaLirAnadin naDaiyadu pOlE naDaiyazhaguDan pala vidham koNDa kanakAramum ashaivadinAlE oLi viDum azhaguDan niraiyaruvi idO enum aNigaL palavum marakata malaiyO enum uDalazhaguDan pirai matiyiduvO enum vaLainudaluDan malar sharamiduvO enum vizhi azhaguDan parandu dishai dishaittup-pArttak-kaNgaL pUttu pUttu aDiyODu ivvulagaiyum marandu rAdhaiyai tEDit-tEDi varum vaDivazhagE unai nADi nADi manam
